title: Sampler
medium:
Medium: silk embroidery on linen foundation
Technique: embroidered in cross, satin, stem, back, and marking cross stitches on plain weave foundation
description: Spot motifs and inscription arranged around a central cross, within a frame of concentric borders, in pale blue, green, yellow and pink on a natural ground.  A tassel of embroidery silks on each corner.
name: Sampler
